author: Kelsie Gibson
title: Florida Georgia Line Have Heard Your Prayers - They're Touring With the Backstreet Boys
text:
Florida Georgia Line and Backstreet Boys Tour 2017 Florida Georgia Line Have Heard Your Prayers â€” They're Touring With the Backstreet Boys March 7, 2017 4 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. Y'all ready for this? Stadium tour w/ our brothers of @backstreetboys is happening! ðŸŽ‰ @Nelly_Mo & @iamchrislane are comin' too! #SmoothTour pic.twitter.com/iq7FXkxLUD 
â€” Florida Georgia Line (@FLAGALine) March 7, 2017 
If you can't stop listening to Florida Georgia Line's song with the Backstreet Boys , "God, Your Mama, and Me," then you're in luck. On Tuesday, the country duo announced that they are hitting the road with the iconic boy band for their Smooth Tour. And that's not all! Nelly and Chris Lane will also join them for the special three shows. Save up your money now, because you can catch them in Boston, Minneapolis, MN, and Chicago this Summer.
